wms_article.title: SK innovation to replace executive company vehicles with EVs

wms_article_body.body: South Korea’s SK innovation Co. and its affiliated subsidiaries will replace their executive vehicles with domestically produced electric vehicles (EVs). The move, aimed at expanding environmental, social responsibility (ESG) and transparent governance management and promoting EV adoption, is drawing attention for its potential to bring a new growth momentum to the domestic EV market. SK innovation announced on Monday that it will convert executive company cars from internal combustion engine models to EVs, including those used by its business subsidiaries. The company is accepting applications for a vehicle change to either Hyundai Motor Co.’s flagship EV models - the IONIQ 9 or the eG80. SK on Co., SK innovation’s battery subsidiary, is the battery supplier for the two models.
